reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the ones from Sephora!
reviews.reviewText: The first time I got razors like these was from Sephora. There were only 3 in a pack and they were expensive. Since then I tried many MANY cheaper options. None compared; and I was almost close to buying more from Sephora until I decided to give amazon a try. These are just as the same for a third of the price and ten times more razors. Love these! Even my boyfriend uses them and loves them as his barber always misses the peach fuzz on his cheekbones. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for peach fuzz!
reviews.reviewText: I used another brand before. I like these better. I like the angle of the handle and these are sharp and get rid of the peach fuzz on my face. Plus you get quite a few got your buck. I have used 2x and I think I can get one more use before it becomes too dull. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but be careful
reviews.reviewText: Make sure to go slow with blade and straight against your skin if that makes sense. I cut myself being quick and moving blade diagonal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Painless, quick way to keep the girl ‘stache in check
reviews.reviewText: A friend who’s much better at being a girl than I am turned me on to these l, and they are so great. I never have to have that pre-event freak out again, best thing to have on hand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They have ridges
reviews.reviewText: Don't get these unless you have course hair or something ?Did not work for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and easy
reviews.reviewText: I like the cost of these eyebrow razors. They are efficient and easy to use. I just wish I didn't have to go over the same area again and again to get rid of all the hair. I use them for my face. They are safe and easy to use that way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yay for these razors!!
reviews.reviewText: I happened across these little razors in place of a battery operated hair removal device, thought I would give them a try. Love them!! They have worked perfectly for upper lip dark hair removal without balding, they work great for the first after-3-months-no-shaving clean up, and I love the disposability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT WORTH BUYING
reviews.reviewText: Previously I've purchased ones like these at Sally's beauty supply and I've never ever had a problem with them cutting my skin or leaving a razor burn. But, these have sliced up my skin and caused razor burn. I probably will end up throwing them away.
